targets.query: SELECT last(asset) from snmp_data where host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last(cputype) from snmp_data where host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last(bios_version) from snmp_data where host =~ /^$host$/ fill(0)
SELECT last(model) from snmp_data where host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last(vendor) from snmp_data where host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last(ipaddr) from snmp_data where host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last(os) from snmp_data where host =~ /^$host$/
select last(value)*.01 from snmp_value where type_instance='uptime' and host=~ /^$host$/
SELECT mean(value) from snmp_shortterm where host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT value from snmp_shortterm where host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
SELECT value from snmp_midterm where host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
SELECT value from snmp_longterm where host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
select value from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /cpu_idle/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
select value from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /cpu_system/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
select value from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /cpu_user/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
select value from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /swap_total/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
select value from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /swap_avail/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
select value from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /memory_total/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
select value from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /mem_cached/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
select value from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /mem_buffer/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
select value from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /memory_avail/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter fill(none)
select sum(value)/1024 from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /disktotal/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter group by time(5s) fill(none)
select sum(value)/1024 from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /diskavail/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter group by time(5s) fill(none)
select sum(value)/1024 from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /diskused/ and host =~ /$host$/ and $timeFilter group by time(5s) fill(none)
select sum(value) from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /diskpercent/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter group by time(5s) fill(none)
select sum(value) from snmp_value where type_instance =~ /diskinodeper/ and host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter group by time(5s) fill(none)

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_value" WITH KEY = "host"
